news.title: Elon Musk’s Grok AI tells users he is fitter than LeBron James and smarter than Leonardo da Vinci
news.summary: Elon Musk's AI, Grok, has been telling users the world’s richest person is smarter and more fit than anyone in the world. Users noted that in a raft of now-deleted posts, the chatbot would frequently rank Musk top in any given field.

news.title: The Guide #218: For gen Zers like me, YouTube isn’t an app or a website – it’s the backdrop to our waking lives
news.summary: Barely a month goes by without more news of streaming sites overtaking traditional, terrestrial TV. Predominant among those sits YouTube, with more than 2.5 billion monthly viewers. When the video-sharing site launched in 2005, there were fears it would replace terrestrial television. It didn’t just replace it – it invented entirely new forms of content.

news.title: The best air fryers, tried and tested for crisp and crunch
news.summary: Air fryers offer time-saving convenience and healthier cooking. Sizes range from compact to XL, while drawer configurations can be double, split or stacked. One we tested features steam cooking, allowing you to whip up dim sum.
